mapper.sql: id, statistics_day, source_type, register_count, one_remain, two_remain, three_remain, four_remain, five_remain, six_remain, seven_remain, fourteen_remain, thirty_remain, execute_time
mapper.insert: insert into daily_keep_record_report (id, statistics_day, source_type, register_count, one_remain, two_remain, three_remain, four_remain, five_remain, six_remain, seven_remain, fourteen_remain, thirty_remain, execute_time) values (#{id}, #{statisticsDay}, #{sourceType}, #{registerCount}, #{oneRemain}, #{twoRemain}, #{threeRemain}, #{fourRemain}, #{fiveRemain}, #{sixRemain}, #{sevenRemain}, #{fourteenRemain}, #{thirtyRemain}, #{executeTime})

insert into daily_keep_record_report
id,
statistics_day,
source_type,
register_count,
one_remain,
two_remain,
three_remain,
four_remain,
five_remain,
six_remain,
seven_remain,
fourteen_remain,
thirty_remain,
execute_time,
#{id},
#{statisticsDay},
#{sourceType},
#{registerCount},
#{one},
#{twoRemain},
#{threeRemain},
#{fourRemain},
#{fiveRemain},
#{sixRemain},
#{sevenRemain},
#{fourteenRemain},
#{thirtyRemain},

mapper.update:
update daily_keep_record_report
statistics_day = #{statisticsDay},
source_type = #{sourceType},
register_count = #{registerCount},
one_remain = #{oneRemain},
two_remain = #{twoRemain},
three_remain = #{threRemaine},
four_remain = #{fourRemain},
five_remain = #{fiveRemain},
six_remain = #{sixRemain},
seven_remain = #{sevenRemain},
fourteen_remain = #{fourteenRemain},
thirty_remain = #{thirtyRemain},
execute_time = #{executeTime},
where id = #{id}

update daily_keep_record_report set statistics_day = #{statisticsDay}, source_type = #{sourceType}, register_count = #{registerCount}, one_remain = #{oneRemain}, two_remain = #{twoRemain}, three_remain = #{threeRemain}, four_remain = #{fourRemain}, five_remain = #{fiveRemain}, six_remain = #{sixRemain}, seven_remain = #{sevenRemain}, fourteen_remain = #{fourteenRemain}, thirty_remain = #{thirtyRemain}, execute_time = #{executeTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select DATE_FORMAT(statistics_day,'%Y-%m-%d') as statisticsDay, source_type as sourceType, register_count as registerCount, one_remain as oneRemain, two_remain as twoRemain, three_remain as threeRemain, four_remain as fourRemain, five_remain as fiveRemain, six_remain as sixRemain, seven_remain as sevenRemain, fourteen_remain as fourteenRemain, thirty_remain as thirtyRemain, execute_time as executeTime from daily_keep_record_report where 1=1
and statistics_day > DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and statistics_day <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by statistics_day desc
